page.title: 15DELIVERIES
page.content: WE OFTEN GET PARCELS AND LETTERS BROUGHT TO THE SCHOOL BY THE POST OFFICE VAN.THE POSTMAN VISITS MANY HOUSES IN THIS AREA,STOPPING HIS SMALL RED VAN AGAIN AND AGAIN TO DELIVER MAIL.OTHER PEOPLE ALSO DELIVER GOODS TO US.SOME FIRMS SEND THEIR GOODS IN THEIR OWN VANS,OTHERS USE FIRMS LIKE SECURICOR TO MAKE THEIR DELIVERIES.THE SCHOOL BUYS PAPER,PAINT,EXERCISE BOOKS ETC.FROM THE CONSORTIUM AND THEIR BIG LORRY CAN ONLY JUST GET THROUGH OUR GATE.ANOTHER BIG VEHICLE WHICH DELIVERS TO US IS THE OIL TANKER WHICH BRINGS THE FUEL FOR OUR CENTRAL HEATING SYSTEM.FOOD IS BROUGHT INTO OUR BLOCK IN VANS AND LORRIES.IN FACT ALL DELIVERIES ARE MADE BY CAR,VAN OR LORRY.THERE IS NO RAILWAY NOW AND NO ONE USES THE RIVER FOR TRANSPORT.
